Replace.Text: "You are exactly this kind of person: you will be attracted at first, but the longer you get along, the more you want to stay away." [NEWLINE] "Thirteen Heroes Chasing Fire" from the anti-Honkai organization of the former civilization has almost infinite Lifespan and unlimited self-recovery ability, spanning countless years, silently fulfilling their duties, in the name of Chiyuan, guarding China, and giving fire to civilization.
Floating life is nothing but success after failure.
Don't be afraid, I'm with you.

Founded by Qin Suyi, the seventh disciple of Taixu's seven apprentices, and her husband "Mr. Chuan", it is not considered a top sect, but the Twelve Routes of Recalling Heart Sword Art, which is inherited from Taixu's sword qi, is also unique. The identities of Qin Suyi's Seven Disciples of Taixu were made public, and there was an endless stream of people coming and going, but no one saw Qin Suyi make a move again. It is said that his martial arts skills have reached the peak.

Created by Su Mei, the second disciple of Taixu Seven Disciples, under the management of this "Wushuang Fairy", it has become a giant in the world. There is a saying: It is better to offend the living king than to provoke Wushuang Lang/Mother. Of course, the real danger is the woman who lives behind the scenes of Wushuangmen: Sumei, who is extremely beautiful and full of wisdom.
Cang Xuan
Danju

Lin Chaoyu is the head of the Taixu Seven Swords, holding the Xuanyuan Sword - Qingchenliu, and can easily defeat the world's second Yan Shiluo when he was young. Zhao Yu, who was brought back to Taixu by Chi Yuan in 1446, began to practice "Taixu Zhenjue" as a maid. In 1458, he co-founded the Taixu Sword School with Chi Yuan and his second younger sister Su Mei. In 1476, the Seven Swords of Taixu succeeded in killing his master, and Lin Chaoyu rebuilt his sect in Taixu Mountain after the fire, and quickly became one of the six schools of martial arts. Lin Zhaoyu is gentle and rarely loses his composure, and seems to only have complaints about his second apprentice, Su Mei. In 1496, because Chiyuan returned to Zhaoyu, he met with Sumei again. (To be continued, the pigeon record has not been updated for a long time).

Su Mei is the second of the Taixu Seven Swords, and she holds the Xuanyuan Sword - Wushuang. There are rumors in the world: "It is better to offend the living Hades than to provoke Wushuang Niang/Lang". Sumei is famous for her beauty and wisdom. She is good at scheming. She personally planned and led the Taixu Transformation in 1476 and successfully killed the Chiyuan Immortal. After killing the teacher, Su Mei noticed that the immortal's coffin had changed, and was alerted that the immortal was not dead, so she went to southern Xinjiang to establish Wushuangmen alone. Although the Wushuangmen under Sumei's rule is not as prestigious as the Taixu Sword Sect, it is still an important giant. In 1496, for Chiyuan's return to the mortal world, she visited Taixu Mountain alone and asked her senior sister Lin Chaoyu for the Taixu Sword School. (to be continued, reminder to update the pigeon record).

Jiang Wanxi is the third of the Taixu Seven Swords, holds the Xuanyuan Sword - Feng Qingyang, and is the sister of the fourth sword Jiang Wanru. In 1461, the Jiang sisters who were prepared to be saintesses by Yan Shiluo, the leader of the Demon Cult, were rescued after Lin Chaoyu defeated Yan Shiluo and joined the Taixu Sword Sect. In 1476, he chose to participate in the killing of teachers in order to rescue his sister who might have gone mad. (This is also a collection of tragedies, who would have thought that the Seven Swords of Taixu would turn into a dead man).

Jiang Wanru is the fourth of the Taixu Seven Swords, holds Xuanyuan Sword - Luo Wuzhuo, and is the younger sister of the third sword Jiang Wanxi. In 1461, the Jiang sisters who were prepared to be saintesses by Yan Shiluo, the leader of the Demon Cult, were rescued after Lin Chaoyu defeated Yan Shiluo and joined the Taixu Sword Sect. In 1476, due to the commandment that Chi Yuan must be killed if she enters the devil, Jiang Wanru was unwilling to accept her fate and participated in the murder of a teacher under Su Mei's leadership. (Speaking of why the two sisters are so good, they are obviously the fuse, but they don't have much role in the show)

Cheng Lingshuang is the fifth of the Taixu Seven Swords. The Xuanyuan Sword he held was lost after killing his master, and he is known as the "Zizai Sword". Cheng Lingshuang joined the Taixu Sword Sect at the age of two, comprehended the fourth level of Jianxin at the age of 13, and realized the Shen Yun after sixteen months, but Ling Shuang failed to comprehend the third level of Taixu - Sword Intent. Cheng Lingshuang is extremely talented. For five thousand years, only Chiyuan, who is a fairy, has mastered the Taixu God. Now Cheng Lingshuang has cultivated the supreme and free sword god with a mortal body. Jianghu said, "He is a natural man, a sword that is unparalleled in the world." In 1476, Cheng Lingshuang, the sword god, was the only successful sword in the hands of the seven disciples, and the battle of killing masters also came to an end after Cheng Lingshuang's sword god destroyed the brains of the immortals. After killing his master, the seven disciples separated. Cheng Lingshuang was born with a sword, walked the world, went through 17 competitions, and won every time with a sword. After that, Ling Shuang entered the bamboo forest in southern Hunan, and has been practicing in seclusion since then. In 1486, under the entrustment of Qin Suyi, the seventh junior sister, Ling Shuang accepted his daughter Li Sushang as his apprentice and established their small sect - Supreme Zizaimen. Because Cheng Lingshuang has cultivated to be a sword god, and her nature is pure, her personality is indifferent, her emotions are restrained, and her worldly reputation, common sense, human feelings... In her opinion, she doesn't care about it.

Ma Feima is the sixth of the Taixu Seven Swords, and holds the Xuanyuan Sword-Chi Jueying. His real name is Ma Yanqing, and he is known as "Zhuju Sword". Ma Feima joined the Taixu Sword Sect at the age of six, and was taken care of by Lin Chaoyu and Su Mei when he was young, so Ma Feima has a very good relationship with them. After killing his teacher in 1476, Ma Feima went south with Su Mei, and then returned alone to Lin Chaoyu's rebuilt Taixu Sword Sect and helped him rebuild. In 1478, Ma Yanqing married Lin Chaoyu, but on the wedding day, she abandoned her real name and changed her name to "Ma Feima", claiming to be ashamed of her old name. Since then, Ma Feima has become more mad and uninhibited. He once went deep into the northern wilderness alone, galloping with a group of horses with his feet, and spread the reputation of "chasing a horse from a hundred miles". Everyone in the world knows that the deputy head of Ma on Taixu Mountain is polite and gentle. But when he went down the mountain, he could do whatever he wanted, recklessly and frivolously, and he was invincible all over the Central Plains. Ma Feima himself also created Taixu Zhenjue and Wushuang Nine Revolutions, both of which are first-class martial arts in the world. Taixu Zhenjue is also considered to be the true swordsmanship of immortals. For Ma Feima, he doesn't talk about how to behave, but only talks about martial arts attainments. He is really a master of a generation.

Qin Suyi is the last of Taixu's Seven Swords, holding the Xuanyuan Sword - Mo Ranxiang, also known as "Ranxiang Sword". Qin Suyi was born in Donghai, originally an orphan girl, but was accepted by Chi Yuan as the last disciple in 1467. Due to the loss of past memories, Qin Suyi is extremely insecure and inseparable from her seniors. In 1476, for unknown reasons, he participated in the killing of teachers. After 1476, Qin Suyi lived in seclusion. Three years later, Qin Suyi, who returned to the arena, was rescued by "Mr. Sichuan" Li Shen when he was besieged. After Li Shen learned that Qin Suyi was one of the Seven Swords of Taixu, he used love as a sword, successfully married Qin Suyi, and cultivated the sword spirit of Taixu. Unfortunately, his talent was limited and he was unable to cultivate the sword heart. In 1481, the two had a daughter, who was only two catties at birth, and grew up healthily under the careful care of Qin Suyi and his maid. Qin Suyi combined Taixu Sword Qi with Li Shen's Chuiyan Thirteen Swords to create "Recalling the Heart Sword Art". But when the daughter who pinned her expectations could not meet her own requirements anyway, Qin Suyi and her daughter went to the desert to ask Cheng Lingshuang to teach Li Sushang, and at the same time gave her his Xuanyuan Sword to express his expectations. In 1496, Chiyuan came back to the world, Yijian Villa was destroyed by fire, and Qin Suyi disappeared.

Chiyuan is not only synonymous with immortals on the land of China, but also immortal and beautiful. The common people regard her as the guardian of China; and among the rivers and lakes, she is recognized as the number one martial artist for thousands of years. The age of the Immortal can no longer be tested. It is only known from some lost ancient books and some folk myths that the Immortal seems to have walked on the land of Shenzhou as early as the Xuanyuan Year. Immortal Chiyuan does what she wants and does not follow common sense. She often travels around the world, slaying demons and demons. Sometimes she turns a blind eye to the turmoil in China, but sometimes she actively participates in it. Except for the seven disciples who are close relatives, no one understands the rules and boundaries of how Chiyuan sees things. Immortals have a dull temperament, occasionally accompanied by people, but spend more time alone. In 1458 A.D., Chi Yuan suddenly established a sect in Taixu Mountain, and recruited Lin Chaoyu, an orphan girl who had been with her for many years, as her first disciple, and Su Mei as her second disciple. By 1467, there were seven apprentices under Xianrenzuo, and people in the world called "Seven Swords of Taixu". In 1475, the Immortal alone repelled the Heavenly Mandate army carrying the Key of Revelation and the Key of Restraint, and blocked the Valkyrie troops that were sweeping across Europe and Asia from the Ming Empire. The next year, after the Taixu Incident, Mount Taixu was turned into scorched earth, and Seven Swords kept silent about the whereabouts of the immortal. Everyone in the world said that the immortal had completed his merits and virtues and returned to the immortal class. In fact, the Seven Disciples teamed up to design a sneak attack on the immortal and destroy the immortal's body. But immortals are immortal, during those twenty years of death, this immortal body was repairing itself all the time. In 1496, the fairy who had been away from the world for twenty years woke up in the body that had broken out of the cocoon and become a butterfly. (It is completely the description of the immortals in China, some of which have been covered up by history, so just write the historical records)

Li Sushang is the young owner of "Yijian Villa" in central Sichuan, and the only daughter of Qin Suyi, the seventh disciple of "Ranxiangjian" under the Chiyuan real person. Sushang was only two catties and three ounces when he was born, and the weight of the same sword was almost the same. Under the careful care of Qin Suyi and his maid, he got rid of the risk of early death. The "Little Banxian" in the rivers and lakes said at Sushang's 100-day banquet that he was "born with a sword, and he will climb to the top of the martial arts in the future." Since then, Qin Suyi has high expectations for his daughter. At the age of five, Sushang accompanied her mother to visit the retired "Freedom Sword" Cheng Lingshuang, and worshiped him as a teacher at the request of her mother, and at the same time received her mother's expectations and the ancient sword Xuanyuan. Su Shang has become an idiot after practicing martial arts, and she has a straightforward and free and easy personality. She is an innocent girl on weekdays. Since I grew up in the desert, my master is also a pure person by nature. Until the first time I tried the sword at the age of fifteen, the girl still didn't know what a lie was, but because of this, the girl always abided by the precepts of justice in her heart. When she tried the sword for the first time, the immature girl did not have the consciousness to fight, did not have the consciousness to test the sword, and did not have the consciousness to kill. Although such a girl easily defeated Eagle, the leader of the desert bandit, in martial arts, she was also defeated by all means. Fortunately, Otto, a Rakshasa who came here by chance, helped her to complete the sword test. Later, together with Otto, they face "Hundred Miles Chasing Horses" Ma Feima, who is also Sushang's Sixth Master Uncle.

Cangxuan, Danzhu and Chiyuan are close friends. In folk mythology, Cangxuan loves things of gold and iron, and created many wonderful ideas with them. It is said that Cangxuan and Danzhu specially made a puppet for the immortal, which is shaped like a girl and has no danger to the real person. They hope to use this puppet to replace the immortal who accompanied them and Danzhu. For the fairy, when she is parting from life and death, does she feel sad for the world where everything is like floating? Since the legend of the Tang Dynasty, this puppet does not seem to appear with the immortals anymore, and the three thousand years of companionship have also been exhausted.
"Sorry, I left this kind of thing to you alone."

Cangxuan's book is Cangxuan's creation, and its essence is a kind of immortal wonder, which is beyond common sense like the Xuanyuan sword that changes according to the user's will. According to records, the immortals call it Xiaoxuan, who can be spoken to people. She looks like a naive girl. Generally, she sits on the yin and yang sphere, and the gossip appears around her body, and she is inseparable from the immortal. However, there are no records since the Tang Dynasty. It's a pity that the fairy magic can't last forever. [NEWLINE]"No Chito...you never let people down. You do a lot for others and everyone sees it"

"No, Chiyuan...you will never let people down. You have done a lot for others, everyone can see it, I am disappointed in myself...want to use our expectations to override your mission, destroy The doctor's plan, trying to keep the unimportant things in your heart... I am very happy to live with you, but I regret that I can't be with you forever... A thousand years is a long time, but for me I can't say enough... My battery will fail one day, and the memory will cool down. I will fall into a deep sleep... But I will not leave you, Akite. I will wait forever, waiting for the people who can save you Appear...Even if you are willing to sacrifice yourself for the world, there must be someone who values ​​you more than this world, such people will definitely appear. Chiyuan, you will not be alone."

Danzhu, Cangxuan and Chiyuan are close friends. During the reign of Xuanyuan, it was recorded that there were many clay puppets in Danzhu's house, all of which were said to be based on the Chiyuan Immortal. When the immortal asked about this, Danzhu just said, "Don't look down on handicrafts!" Feeling that life is short, Danzhu worked with Cangxuan to create such a magical thing as the Cangxuan Book, hoping that after a hundred years of life, This puppet can replace himself and Cangxuan to accompany the immortal. If he knows that this puppet has accompanied the immortal for thousands of years, he doesn't know what his mind is.
"I want to pass on your story, and I hope everyone can like you."
Disciple of Wushuang Sect, who acts secretly and is good at sneak attacks
A disciple of Yijian Villa, he is upright and has a great reputation
Taixu Sword School
Taixu Sword School

Knights use martial arts to control chaos, and only military power is paramount. Now that the world is in chaos, although I don’t have the guts to directly attack the imperial city, but I do have the ability to kill two corrupt officials who are fish and meat. There is a saying: It is better to offend the living king than to provoke Wushuang Lang/Mother. Its superior martial arts unparalleled nine-turn is amazingly powerful, but I don't know what price needs to be paid behind this powerful power

Floating life calendar, nothing but success after failure

The Taixu Sword Sect founded by Immortal Chiyuan, the martial art of the township is the world-leading Taixu Sword Qi, recognized as the supreme martial arts. The seven disciples under the Chiyuan Immortal Seat, known as the Seven Swords of Taixu, six women and one man, each wield a Xuanyuan Sword, are all extremely talented people.

"You are exactly this kind of person: you will be attracted at first, but the longer you get along, the more you want to stay away." [NEWLINE] "Thirteen Heroes Chasing Fire" from the anti-Honkai organization of the former civilization has almost infinite Lifespan and unlimited self-recovery ability, spanning countless years, silently fulfilling their duties, in the name of red kite, guarding China, and giving fire to civilization

The first way to teach Yixin swordsmanship, the swordsmanship becomes more and more fierce, and the shots are more disciplined, gaining an additional +3 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and can move after attacking
Recalling the Heart Sword Art Second Route

The second way of Yixin swordsmanship is awarded, the swordsmanship becomes more fierce, the body method becomes more flexible, and gains an additional +3 [ICON_Strength] combat power +1 [ICON_Movement] basic mobility
Recalling the Heart Sword Art Third Way
The third way of Yixin swordsmanship is awarded, the swordsmanship becomes more fierce, and the sense becomes more acute, gaining an additional +3 [ICON_Strength] combat power +1 basic vision
The Fourth Way of Recalling Heart Swordsmanship

Obtained the fourth way of Yixin swordsmanship, the swordsmanship becomes more fierce, the lightness kungfu becomes more proficient, and gains an additional +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power, ignoring the loss of movement power of the land
The Fifth Way of Recalling Heart Swordsmanship

The fifth path of Yixin swordsmanship was awarded, the swordsmanship became more and more fierce, the lightness kung fu reached the limit, gained an additional +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and ignored the cliffs
Recalling the Heart Sword Art Sixth Route
Received the sixth path of Yixin swordsmanship, the swordsmanship becomes more and more fierce, comrades in arms are inseparable, get an additional +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power + 50% support bonus
The Seventh Way of Recalling Heart Swordsmanship

Obtained the seventh path of Yixin swordsmanship, the swordsmanship becomes more and more powerful and proficient, gaining an additional +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power, if the movement power is left, you can attack 1 time

Unparalleled Nine Turns Second Turn
Practice Wushuang Nine Turns Second Turn, improve physical fitness, gain an additional +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and still have the strength to move after attacking
Unparalleled Nine Turns Third Turn

Wushuang Nine Turns Fourth Turn

The Record of Folding Swords in Shenzhou·Li Sushang

A girl who has become obsessed with martial arts, she learned Taixu Sword Qi from Ling Shuang since she was a child. She went out to test the sword in order to comprehend the "Sword Intent", but during this trip, she met a stranger, heard a bad news, and embarked on a dangerous road …
Shenzhou Folding Sword Record·Red Kite
The woman who died and came back to life in a stone room, only the name "Red Kite" and the vague memory of "Seven People" remained in her broken mind

Taixu Sword Qi: Soul Accumulation

The Taixu Sword Sect founded by Immortal Chiyuan, the martial art of the township is the world-leading Taixu Sword Qi, recognized as the supreme martial arts. The seven disciples under the Chiyuan Immortal Seat, known as the Seven Swords of Taixu, six women and one man, each wield a Xuanyuan Sword, are all extremely talented people.

The state of mind melts into the lake until the water stops, the lake of the heart freezes to be dust-free, the ice of the heart is transparent to become a mirror, and the heart-qi is invisible to be empty. Those who have cultivated the sword heart can regard the heaven and the earth as the dantian, and turn the flesh into the meridian. Qi is regarded as the origin of martial arts, and there is no need to hide

The shape aggregates of the five aggregates of Taixu have four elements of guarding, transforming, enlightening, and opening, with a total of twenty-one forms. There are three forms of opening sword: crescent moon, broken sea, and split sky; there are six forms of sword transformation: falcon, black falcon, swift, rattan sparrow, cloud eagle, and moon heron; and six forms of guarding sword: weeping willow, orchid, and strength Bamboo, black chrysanthemum, pure lotus, green pine, and the sword shape have six styles: rock breaking, chaotic thunder, thunderbolt, landslide, instant dust, and shocking wind.

The soul aggregate of Taixu's five aggregates is the essence of swordsmanship. The way of the sword is ever-changing, and the sword itself is nothing but a support. After comprehending the soul, all kinds of weapons in the world are like swords, and you don't have to stick to the shape of the sword. Only when you reach this level can you call it a master of swordsmanship

The god is extremely changeable. There is also a sword without a sword, and with a deified sword, the sword energy is self-contained, which is the power of the gods. The god is extremely changeable, and everything is wonderful in terms of words, and he cannot be questioned in form. Neither form nor form is needed, the sword fills space, the sword is space. So everywhere, everywhere

The content of the martial arts jointly developed by Ma Feima and Sumei has nothing to do with Taixu Sword Qi. In Wushuang Nine Transformations, the dantian is used as a medicine guide, and the meridians are used as a medicine tripod, which draws the true energy to travel throughout the body, strengthening the body and organs. There are nine levels of internal energy, called "Nine Turns". Every time one breaks through one level, one is reborn, and one's skills are greatly improved. However, none of the sect's disciples can practice it to level six, and all of them lost their minds and died.

Wushuang's ninth turn, sixth turn, is almost insane. The content of the martial arts jointly developed by Ma Feima and Su Mei has nothing to do with Taixu Sword Qi. In Wushuang Nine Transformations, the dantian is used as a medicine guide, and the meridians are used as a medicine tripod, which draws the true energy to travel throughout the body, strengthening the body and organs. There are nine layers of internal energy, called "Nine Turns", every time you break through a layer, you will be reborn, and your skills will be greatly improved
The seventh path of Yixin swordsmanship, the limit that disciples of Yijian Villa are allowed to learn

In the real rivers and lakes, people practice martial arts, practice true qi, fight for righteousness, slay demons and eliminate demons. The six major martial arts sects are even more famous. The seven disciples of Xu went down the mountain to roam the rivers and lakes, which brought a lot of anecdotes to this world, and the sect founded by them, which has the supreme magic skills inherited from the Taixu Sword School, can be called the Holy Land of Martial Arts
